de.ailis.usb4java.descriptors

Class SimpleUsbConfigurationDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ailis.usb4java.descriptors.SimpleUsbDescriptor
      • de.ailis.usb4java.descriptors.SimpleUsbConfigurationDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.usb.UsbConfigurationDescriptor, javax.usb.UsbDescriptor

    public final class SimpleUsbConfigurationDescriptor
extends SimpleUsbDescriptor
implements javax.usb.UsbConfigurationDescriptor
    Simple USB configuration descriptor.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)
    See Also:

        bLength - The descriptor length.
        bDescriptorType - The descriptor type.
        wTotalLength - The total length.
        bNumInterfaces - The number of interfaces.
        bConfigurationValue - The configuration value.

        bmAttributes - The attributes.
        bMaxPower - The maximum power.
